## Introduction

[STUMPY](https://github.com/TDAmeritrade/stumpy) is a powerful and scalable Python library for identifying repeating patterns in your timeseries. It does this by efficiently computing something called a [matrix profile](https://stumpy.readthedocs.io/en/latest/Tutorial_The_Matrix_Profile.html).

The app is a Bokeh app wrapped in a nice Panel template.
